name: Astrela Starlight
description: Astrela Starlight is an adventure game where the player can explore, interact with various NPCs, complete quests, mine and refine materials, then build new spacecraft and space stations.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or greater, 64 bit Processor: 2.2ghz or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4600 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
